message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 40% of the original amount, it's a good deal!
I'll take 42%, but I think you can do better than 58%!
You're getting closer to 42%, I'll meet you in the middle
I'll take 36%, you're getting too greedy!
You're getting closer to 36%, I'm willing to compromise
I'll take 32%, you're getting closer to 68%!
